metadata.synopsis: If Devella survives the Serial Killer, she will be at Basilisk Gate with this one liner
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on S_LOW_Devella_Fountainhead after killing Dolor.

23.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
23.text: Any more to report on the Bhaalist resurgence?

49.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
49.text: Ah - I was hoping I hadn't missed you. The patriars are safe, but it took longer to calm them down than I was hoping.

115.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
115.text: Hope you're closer to some answers, Bhaalspawn. Did you find the tribunal?

73.speaker: Player
73.text: It's all over... I faced Bhaal himself.

112.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
112.text: OH! You magnificent bastard. You faced him and LIVED! You have to tell me how!

105.speaker: Player
105.text: I didn't live. Bhaal killed me. But I was resurrected, free of his curse.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: There was a monster - the Slayer - words cannot describe it.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: He dragged me to a mystic blood-pool. I drowned in the death-fluid.

62.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
62.text: Fascinating... I mean, ahem, how horrible. Well done for making it out.

90.speaker: Player
90.text: I don't feel like talking about it.

34.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
34.text: Understandable. It must have been quite the ordeal.

101.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
101.text: It sounds as if his cult has crumbled, even if it took everything you had to stop it?

37.speaker: Player
37.text: I killed their leader - my own sister.

117.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
117.text: A duel between Bhaalspawn, in the Temple of Bhaal itself! What I would have given to be a witness to that.

95.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
95.text: You're a wonder. Soon you will be sewn into the very fabric of this city as one of our legends. It's an honour to know you.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: I just did what needed to be done.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Damn right. I turned down the power of a god to save you all.

104.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
104.text: Not many would have it in them to do as you have.

15.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
15.text: Oh. Ah. Thank you. I didn't do much, though.

114.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
114.text: No matter what you are - what you were - you are the best of the Baldurians now.

109.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
109.text: I'd say you should join the Fist - we need detectives like you. But I suspect you'll need a good long rest.

91.speaker: Player
91.text: Thanks, but I just want to live a normal life now.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: I'm no hero. Bhaal's hand forced me to kill my partner.

100.speaker: Player
100.text: I'm no hero. Bhaal's hand forced me to kill my best friend.

97.speaker: Player
97.text: Don't look up to me. Bhaal made me cause the death of a whole village once.

102.speaker: Player
102.text: It was easier than I expected, actually.

43.speaker: Player
43.text: The Baldurians need not worry about any more murders.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: The cult is gone, for now.

98.speaker: Player
98.text: Father Bhaal will never forget Baldur's Gate.

103.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
103.text: It wouldn't be the Gate if our favourite superstition was entirely thwarted. But you've stopped him for now, at least.

57.speaker: Narrator
57.text: *This woman sees a fairy tale hero in the making. But you are the grinning villain. You always will be.*

71.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
71.text: I see it in your eyes... He got you, didn't he? I'm sorry...

33.speaker: Player
33.text: I killed Sarevok at the tribunal.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Sarevok was but a withered husk. There's worse than him out there.

2.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
2.text: For your sake as much as any other, I hope you found the mastermind behind him...

27.speaker: Player
27.text: He never left... He's been rotting beneath the city all this time.

9.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
9.text: A shrivelled undead? Eugh. Thank you for putting him down. Would think the Bhaalists want the dead to stay that way.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: There's a lot more to it... I have to find the Temple of Bhaal now.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: The tribunal is not the heart of the cult... but the Temple of Bhaal itself.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: The tribunal is not the heart of the cult... but the Temple of Bhaal itself.

1.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
1.text: It's true... it's still there. I heard the only one to walk out alive from that place was the Bhaalspawn who killed Sarevok all those years ago.

10.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
10.text: But you killed Sarevok again. You can survive. You can end this. I know it.

8.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
8.text: Hells, no witness has even claimed to have seen it in decades.

86.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
86.text: What I'd give to see the place... There must be so much history completely untouched...

70.speaker: Player
70.text: That cult is disgusting. Did you know that Sarevok had a child with his own daughter?

50.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
50.text: You must have seen some troubling things to find that out. Do you know who your own mother is?

29.speaker: Player
29.text: I have a gut feeling Bhaal made me. I don't have a mother.

80.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
80.text: If that is true, you must be of unparalleled value to your Father.

18.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
18.text: Have you won your freedom yet?

83.speaker: Player
83.text: A Bhaalist servant tells me I'm a pureblood Spawn - but I don't know what it means.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: It's too disgusting. I don't want to think about it.

84.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
84.text: Bhaal is not a living man any longer... I can't even begin to fathom how you were born. Let's not dwell.

88.speaker: Player
88.text: Can you remind me where I was supposed to go?

20.speaker: Player
20.text: 'Candulhallow's Tombstones' - any idea where that is?

19.speaker: Player
19.text: I have to kill you. I will honour my duty as an Unholy Assassin.

78.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
78.text: Tell me, how did your investigations into the Bhaalist tribunal go?

56.speaker: Player
56.text: I found the tribunal and killed Sarevok.

7.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
7.text: Then it's over... at least, until a new Bhaalspawn emerges.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: I found the tribunal and killed Sarevok and his granddaughter Orin.

66.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
66.text: He had a granddaughter?! What are you saying, Devella, of course he did. If there's one thing you can rely on a Bhaalspawn to do, it's to spread their Lord's seed. Vigorously.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: You don't need to worry about the tribunal or the Bhaalist resurgence anymore. I killed Orin. She was the one behind it all.

45.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
45.text: So she was the one who was staging those dioramas of murder?

30.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
30.text: I knew it had to be someone other than Sarevok!

53.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
53.text: I suppose even Bhaal must have needed new blood at some point.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: There is much I didn't tell you. I am Bhaal's child. I killed my own sister.

82.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
82.text: That's... awful. I'm not sure if I'm glad or disgusted that you handled that instead of me. But you did handle it.

111.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
111.text: I won't go into quite as much detail in my report, but thank you nonetheless. It's nice to have the full picture.

99.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
99.text: Know the Baldurians will accept you as a hero. We did as much with the spawn who first killed Sarevok. You are our champion, now, too.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: Describe in violent detail how you put an end to the Bhaalist resurgence.

21.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
21.text: Fascinating... I wish I could put half as much into my final report, but, well, I think my superiors would rather I just stick to the facts.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: There was a lot of blood. Best I spare you the details.

3.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
3.text: Perhaps you're right. Well, in any case - thank you.

63.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
63.text: You should think about joining the Fist, you know. We could do with more people like you.

85.speaker: Player
85.text: I really don't have time for that. Just be thankful it's over.

93.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
93.text: Of course, of course... I am. Believe me, I really am.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: First I slaughtered Orin, then I took my rightful place as Bhaal's new Chosen.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: I found the tribunal and killed Sarevok.

113.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
113.text: So he was back. I was right!

118.speaker: Player
118.text: That cult is disgusting. Did you know that Sarevok had a child with his own daughter?

16.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
16.text: The things you must have seen to find that out. Tell me you put a stop to it.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: Can you remind me where I was supposed to go?

28.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
28.text: There's a place called 'Candulhallow's Tombstones' that I've seen cropping up in the reports. Seems to be where the murderers are sent once they've completed their kills.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: 'Candulhallow's Tombstones' - any idea where that is?

116.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
116.text: It's not a place I'd ever heard of, if I'm honest. But rumour has it there were some hidden cellars somewhere near the Elfsong. If I had to look anywhere, I'd look there.

38.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
38.text: Ah, then I'll leave you to it. I'll stretch out my stint here as long as my break allows, in case you find anything.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: You are looking at Bhaal's newest Unholy Assassin.
